Game.Name: Game Boy Advance Video - SpongeBob SquarePants - Volume 3 (USA)
Game.plot: Now you can watch the wild underwater antics of SpongeBob SquarePants on your Game Boy Advance. Volume 3 of the SpongeBob SquarePants video series includes four episodes from the cartoon: "Walking Small," "Mermaidman & Barnacleboy II," "Hooky," and "Texas." In this collection, you'll see SpongeBob do everything from summoning superheroes to riding fishing hooks.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/926727.html
